content: So that's a very good news for us, not only is the stream been reactivated, but the last half of the working cap facility has also been repaid to us and the other lenders to our account that was CAD 3.94 million. For the royalties and streams segment alone, cash flows from operations reached CAD 40.5 million compared to CAD 27 million in Q1 of last year. And finally, on Page 15, you will find a summary of our financial position, our consolidated cash balance was CAD 449 million at the end of Q1, including CAD 293 million for Osisko Gold Royalties and CAD 57 million for Osisko Development.
